devdoc.details: Implements transparent treasury management, member contributions, and democratic loan voting

params._contributionFrequency: How often members should contribute (in seconds)

params._chamaId: ID of the Chama to join

params._loanId: ID of the loan to repay

params._support: True to approve, false to reject

devdoc.title: ChamaDAO

contribute(uint256).notice: Make a contribution to the Chama

executeLoan(uint256).notice: Execute a loan request after voting period

getChamaMembers(uint256).notice: Get all members of a Chama

getUserChamas(address).notice: Get all Chamas a user is part of

requestLoan(uint256,uint256,string,uint2.notice: Request a loan from the Chama

userdoc.notice: A decentralized autonomous organization for community savings groups (Chamas)
